title: Greedy Ring
summaries: The Greedy Ring is a Hardmode accessory that combines the Discount Card's 20% discount off at any NPC shop, the Lucky Coin's 20% chance of spawning 1-10 extra coins whenever an enemy is hit, and the Gold Ring's increased coin pickup range.
